events.message: I reported a car accident that occurred yesterday evening at the intersection on Main Street involving my vehicle and another car.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident after reviewing the initial report and police documentation provided by the claimant.
An agent specialized in vehicle collision claims has been assigned to handle this case moving forward.
The claimant has received confirmation that their auto accident claim is now officially acknowledged and under review.
We have requested the claimant to submit the police report, photographs of the damage, and a repair estimate from the vehicle service center.
The claimant has submitted all requested documents, including the police report, detailed photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair cost estimates.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing all submitted evidence and contacted witnesses to verify the circumstances of the collision.
The investigation concluded with verification of the accident details as reported; liability has been determined accordingly.
A settlement offer reflecting repair costs and coverage limits has been proposed to the claimant for consideration.
The claimant has expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication throughout the process.
Following the claimant's agreement, the auto accident claim has been formally approved for payment processing.
The settlement payment for the vehicle repairs has been issued to the claimantâ€™s bank account successfully.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation of receipt by the claimant.
The case files and all documents related to this auto accident claim have been archived for record-keeping purposes.
